dmca.title: DMCA Notice for Total Beverage Solution website www.gowld.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Kate Gardner [mailto:Kate.Gardner@gettyimages.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2006 7:50 PM
To: DMCA
Cc: coryk@siteopedia.com; dpardus@totalbeveragesolutions.com
Subject: DMCA Notice for Total Beverage Solution website www.gowld.com



Dear Registered Agent:

I represent Getty Images who has authorized me to act on its behalf for
copyright infringement notification.  

Infringement(s) of Getty Images' photograph(s) (the "Photograph")
has/have been detected on the Web site www.gowld.com. The infringing
photograph appears on the Web site on their Contact Us page. A copy of
the infringing photographs is attached for your assistance in removal. 

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the
detected infringements.  I hereby request that you immediately issue a
cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified postings and
prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address, from
posting the infringing photograph to your servers in the future. Please
be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must "expeditiously
remove or disable access to" the infringing photograph upon receiving
this notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of
immunity under the DMCA. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of herein is not authorized by Getty Images, its licensing
representatives, or the law.  The information provided herein is
accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of
perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Getty Images for
matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive
rights in its copyrighted material. 

Please send to me at the address below a prompt response indicating the
actions you have taken to resolve this matter. 

<<GoWldDMCANoticeand takedown letter 2006.12.05.pdf>> 

Very truly yours,

Kate Gardner

Copyright Compliance Specialist

Getty Images (US), Inc. 

601 N. 34th St.

Seattle, WA 98103

Phone: 206-925-6732

Fax: 206-925-5623

Kate.Gardner@gettyimages.com
